name: TC1373-01 - Possibility to leave a “Kinda” mark.
description: Objective: Verify that the user can successfully leave a 'Kinda' mark on a flashcard when the card is turned.
descriptionHtml: Objective: Verify that the user can successfully leave a 'Kinda' mark on a flashcard when the card is turned.
